Texts.Chs: 不要忘了升级军备作坊，只要你有足够的资源。 这是绝对值得的。
Texts.Eng: Don't forget to upgrade this station whenever you have the resources to do so. It is absolutely worth the effort.

With an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; you can fashion weapons and armor. Upgraded, it provides tons of variety. Try building an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; now. You'll need to ^orange;Research^reset; into ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset;.
